DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : History good overall health without history recent ( within 3 month ) acute disease ; Physical examination within normal limit ; Laboratory evaluation ; include complete blood count ( CBC ) , serum electrolyte determination , clot time , chest xray , pulmonary function testing , electrocardiogram ( EKG ) within normal limit ; Nonsmokers define never smoke smoke past 2 year ; Smokers define moderate ( 1 pack per day 3+ year ) heavy ( 12 pack 10+ year ) ; Subjects must willing make time commitment necessary study . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Any study subject fulfill criterion eligibility . Individuals history allergy adverse reaction atropine local anesthetic ; Individuals test positive human immunodeficiency virus hepatitis virus ; Individuals chronic medication currently receive medication ; Pregnant lactating individual , since effect hyperoxia fetus unclear .
